skills.name: Holy Phalanx
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 15s] Deploys the weapon: Summons a holy beam every 2s, dealing 750.0% ATK of Physical DMG against enemies within an AOE. Nearby teammates gain 20.0% Crit Rate for 10s; if wielded by Celestial Hymn, she gains 5.0 SP per second during this period.

skills.name: Divine Mending
skills.description: When the wielder attacks impaired enemies, there is a 60.0% chance of healing 89 HP for team. CD:3s.

skills.name: Angelic Pinion
skills.description: The team gains 10.0% attack SP regen; if wielded by Celestial Hymn, she gains an additional 35.0% attack SP regen. This effect cannot stack.
